data.event: Richmond’s Bo Kong Vegetarian Restaurant was shut down March 10 by the Vancouver Coastal Health Authority, marking the city’s sixth restaurant closure of the year and its fifth for rodent infestation.
The Bo Kong Vegetarian Restaurant re-opened a day later, on March 11, after an inspector found the conditions had improved sufficiently.
